EmailTemplate.name: Direct to Website
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI Coolers! We are excited to hear from you. Here at YETI, giving back to the communities we serve is an important part of who we are as a company. Our program exists to serve all qualified nonprofit organizations by providing a genuine unmatched customer experience. We look forward to working with you to make your event rugged, tough and successful the YETI way!
You can refer to our website at https://yeti.formstack.com/forms/fundraising to start your application process. We are excited to have the opportunity to work with you and we look forward to hearing from you!
*Please note YETI is unable to support donations at this time
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname}
The YETI Fundraising Team
funderaising@yeti.com
yeti.com
